subdisciplines.name: Process Design
subdisciplines.description: The creation of new processes or the improvement of existing processes in chemical engineering.

subdisciplines.name: Transport Phenomena
subdisciplines.description: The study of momentum, heat, and mass transport in chemical systems to understand their behavior.

subdisciplines.name: Thermodynamics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the relationship between heat, work, and energy in chemical systems to understand their behavior.

subdisciplines.name: Process Control and Instrumentation
subdisciplines.description: The design and implementation of automated systems to control chemical processes.

subdisciplines.name: Process Simulation
subdisciplines.description: The use of computational methods to simulate and optimize the behavior of chemical processes.

subdisciplines.name: Chemical Reaction Engineering
subdisciplines.description: The study of chemical kinetics and the design of chemical reactors for optimal chemical reaction rates.
